actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for annual flu shots.

summary.text: Authorizes payment under the supplementary medical insurance program, of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, for annual immunization against influenza.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for annual flu shots.
